text: læa s̄ìng dı thī̀ xạllxḥˌ thrng h̄ı̂ r̀x sūl k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ yụd mā dị̂ cāk phwk k̄heā(phwk ya ḥūd) phwk cêā midị̂ h̄en̆dh̄enụ̄̀xy d̂wy kār k̄hī̀ m̂ā h̄rụ̄x k̄hī̀ xūṭ̄h xxk pị tæ̀ xạllxḥˌ thrng h̄ı̂ brrdā r̀x sūl k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ mī xảnāc h̄enụ̄x p̄hū̂ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ læa xạllxḥˌ pĕn p̄hū̂thrng xānup̣hāph h̄enụ̄x thuks̄ìngthukxỳāng
